content: {"name": "Bay Ridge Community Service Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- They provide meals on wheels services that requireyou to call ahead for registration.\n- Please make sure you call case worker to book appointments and schedule deliveries on 7186803530\n", "email": "", "url": "https://www.bayridgecenter.com/food-programs", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6935 4th Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Bay Ridge", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11209", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.6338574, "longitude": -74.0235958}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 748-0650", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Meal delivery available for seniors"}]}
